data.text:
We want to make you feel as if you were in a restaurant, the only difference being a few hundred metres in altitude 😉
Our #SpazioItaliaBar strives to offer you the very best-from dishes created by JRE chefs to simple but high-quality snacks ⭐ 👉 https://t.co/8KKvyGnNam https://t.co/rYnufi8m7M

@Sween22C We apologize and we are really sorry for the inconvenience. You can write to our Baggage Competence Center to the e-mail baggage@airdolomiti.it and the colleagues will provide you an answer as soon as possible. We stay at your complete disposal for any further informati

@sxz5046 Dear Suzanne, we have sent a reminder to our Customer Relations Office, that will answer you as soon as possible. As an alternative you can try to contact also the lost and found at the Airport in order to ask if there is some other news.We remain at your disposal for an

data.text: @sxz5046 @toscanaeroporti @united @lufthansa We apologize for any inconvenience you have been experiencing. We suggest you send an email to baggage@airdolomiti.it. Our Customer Relations colleagues will take care of your request and get back to you as soon as possible. We remain at your disposal for any further assistance.
@BethShannon4 @bailly_ca Dear Beth, sorry but now we have realized that the E-mail address above is not completed. The right E-mail address is baggage@airdolomiti.it. Thank you
@BethShannon4 @bailly_ca Dear Beth, it is a .it. Please write to this E-mail address for any assistance with luggage. We remain at your disposal for any information. Kind regards

@331miles Hi Jeff, we are sorry for the situation. 
If you wish, you can also contact our Baggage Competence Center for more information at the E-Mail address baggage@airdolomiti.it . Please also add your file reference to the E-Mail

@331miles Hi Jeff, we are really sorry for the inconvenience. If you are not able to check the status with the Lost&Found at the airport, you can contact our Baggage Competence Center at the E-Mail address baggage@airdolomiti.it
@RogiestPhilippe Hi Coinman, we are really glad you like it! 😊 and... enjoy your breakfast!😋

@bailly_ca Hi Alex, we are really sorry, flights to/from Florence, due to the geographical location of the airport itself, sometimes undergo load variations in order to take off/land safely. For more info, you can contact the Lost&Found at the airport or write to baggage@airdolom
@JeremyRussell12 If you wish more information, you can also contact our Baggage Competence Center at the E-Mail address baggage@airdolomiti.it
@JeremyRussell12 Hi Jeremy, we are sorry for the inconvenience, you can check the status here https://t.co/xahAtwQ6vK

data.text:
Take in two seas on a coast-to-coast jaunt across the region. Greet the day with a spot of snorkelling 🐟 in the Adriatic at the Torre Guaceto Protected Marine Area. Puglia is waiting for you! 👉 https://t.co/gAr94kss5f
#WeAreinPuglia 

📸 Leonardo D'Angelo / @WeAreInPuglia https://t.co/Yw20pPgTZ1
@fs_fra We are really sorry to hear that you are not satisfied, and thank you for your message. As always, we will keep on working to improve our service and experience

urls.title: Turin attractions: travel guide to the city | Air Dolomiti
urls.description: A complete travel guide to the main attractions of Turin, in Italy. Discover what to do, what to see and where to eat in Turin on Air Dolomiti website. Read our articles and discover where to go around in the city center and its surroundings: visit the city like a local and make your trip unforgettable.

data.text:
There are countless secrets to discover in Turin - have you ever been there? 😍
Book your flight now and don’t forget to tag us in your holiday snaps 📸👉 https://t.co/DGUBATFzfn
#Turin #AirDolomiti https://t.co/vkttkucpvI

@OanaAStefan Hi Oana, we are really sorry for the inconvenience. 
Thank you for filling in the form, you will receive a feedback as soon as possible.

@thelorryist Hi Tom, could you please write us a private message with your PIR?
Thank you!
@mrsmadai ... and nothing can make us happier!😊 We wait for you on the next flight ✈️

urls.title: Brindisi for history fans (among others!) | Air Dolomiti Blog
urls.description: The best way to begin a tour of Brindisi is to get inspired by Dante’s Divine Comedy, starting from his meeting with Virgil.

data.text: Spanning the Middle Ages, Ancient Rome and the modern age, Brindisi ☀️ reveals to visitors a soul rich in history and pivotal developments. Most importantly, you can now fly there… 👉 https://t.co/QXm5AHv6oQ https://t.co/8VxUWhY3Gl

data.text:
Who are the JRE? They're the Jeunes Restaurateurs 🍽️ with a common goal: to share their talent and love of food with like-minded people.
As Italians 🍝, we at Air Dolomiti decided to partner with them to take our in-flight service to the next level 👉 https://t.co/8KKvyGnNam https://t.co/Sk9mvARMFJ

@ZeugmaFr HI Sir,
we apologize for the inconvenience.
 In this case we suggest you to contact our department in charge on the following link: Post-flight assistance | Air Dolomiti.

Air Dolomiti Team

data.text: @OanaAStefan Please fill in our form, providing your Lufthansa ticket (220-). Should it be necessary to contact our LH colleagues for your file, we will forward it to them, as we are always in contact with LH Customer Relations. Thank you for your cooperation.

@OanaAStefan Dear Oana,
thank you for your feedback. We understand your needs, and we invite you to fill in the form provided: your file will be individually evaluated and you will receive feedback from the relevant department. Thank you for your understanding.
@Hawkeye_LOWI Wow, like a family reunion 😍 may we repost this pic on our social channels in the future, by mentioning you? 📸

data.text:
@OanaAStefan @lufthansa Dear Oana,
We are terribly sorry about the cancellation of yesterday's FRA-INN flight. Should you require ad hoc feedback, please fill out the "Flight Irregularity" form at this link, thank you: https://t.co/54prB2goa1
Ciao @nelsonlariccia ! 😊 Grazie mille!! ✈️

@larsvivendi Wir entschuldigen uns für die Flugverspätung. Wenn es sich um einen Flug mit Air Dolomiti handelt, können Sie sich mit unserem Customer Relations Büro in Verbindung setzen, indem Sie das Online-Formular auf unserer Website ausfüllen.
@MUC_Airport Happy Anniversary to us! 🥳 30 🌈✈️
@akinder71 Dear Andrew, we are deeply sorry for the delay of your flight. Should you need further assistance with an Air Dolomiti 101- ticket, please write us a private message.

📅 On 1 June 1992, our first flight Munich-Venice-Munich touched down in a Dash 8-300 aircraft. 
We wanted to celebrate the 30th anniversary milestone of this route together with you, our passengers 💙
Were any of you there on that day? 😄
#AdAstra
@MUC_Airport / #veneziaairport https://t.co/RPgU41xHdm
@Air_Dolomiti Danke für das Feedback Lars, für Air Dolomiti-Flüge versuchen wir immer zu helfen: wenn Sie uns brauchen, sind wir da 😉 in der Zwischenzeit, wir sehen uns an Bord! ✈️
@larsvivendi Lieber Lars, wir entschuldigen uns für die Verspätung unseres Fluges. Wenn wir Ihnen weiterhelfen können, schreiben Sie uns bitte eine PN. Vielen Dank!
@the_yung_teen Thank you, Terry! 😊
@MauroGrendel Grazie mille, Mauro! 😍✈️

data.text:
@mphulme Hi Patrick, you can contact us at the number 0039 0452886140 and by providing us your file reference we will be glad to assist you.
As an alternative you can also write us a direct message and we can chat with you to find out further information about your case.
@LudantoRed Thank you very much Ludanto! We hope to welcome you back on board very soon! ✈️😊
@TheFlyingEnggnr What would be your choice? 💺
@the_yung_teen excellent choice!

Sam and Marco were friends until Marco stole Sam's window seat, forcing him to have to stretch his arm to take this great pic!
Do you prefer a window or an aisle seat?
Make sure to reserve your preferred seat in advance! 😉👉 https://t.co/aMRt2h7LzV
📸 @_samuele_carboni_ https://t.co/bD0iuo6KIy

Experiencing the world from the skies fills the eyes and heart with beauty. #Pilot John Gillespie Magee Jr. captured this wonderous sight in his famous poem ✏️ 
Discover the magic of "High flight" on the #AirDolomitiBlog 👉 https://t.co/bk2XDxiJIH https://t.co/sPJVVgpaaS

data.text:
Edward Taylor built and maintained the Wright Brothers' first airplane. His birthday is the right day to honor all aircraft mechanics and their work⚙️ 
That's what we're doing today on AMT 2022, without you, nothing would work! Thank you to all Lufthansa Group aircraft mechanics! https://t.co/RDgaEOwfdH
@AndreasPolz We hope you enjoyed your experience on board with us! We look forward to seeing you soon ✈️
@PollastriGiulia Dear Giulia, we have replied to you via DM. Thank you.
@Operatraveller Dear passenger, thank you for your report. Airport/gate announcements are not under our control, but we are sorry for this inconvenience you have experienced.

@nelsondl Hello David, today's strike concerns airport staff and not our company, and we are doing all we can to assist all passengers involved. We are sorry about this situation. If you have an Air Dolomiti ticket (101-), please write it to us in DM. Thank you.
@the_yung_teen This land is unique! 😍

#WeAreinPuglia 

📸 Vincenzo Pioggia / @WeAreInPuglia https://t.co/c6Vi1wKaBz

data.text:
The Mediterranean sandwich was born thanks to chef Dario Guidi, who combined simple ingredients like burrata, raisins and escarole to create a sandwich packed with flavours 😋
You can try this gourmet sandwich on board our flights! ✔️
Check out the menu 👉 https://t.co/8KKvyGnNam https://t.co/eHzEVbdMMr
@cialeander We always suggest to be at the airport 2 hours before the departure 😇

We are proud to dedicate today's article to her on our #AirDolomitiBlog 👉 https://t.co/wrRVskD5xW https://t.co/ONqhwXEZ82

entity.name: It's Mother's Day
entity.description: The following Tweets are part of a live conversation detected by an algorithm.

data.text:
Mum is 
a protective gesture 👶
a thought that changes your day 🍬
a hug for every member of the family 🐶
Mum takes care of you, mum holds you tightly, mum is a phone call across the ocean.
Whatever mum you are, you're always celebrated... but today even more 💙
#happymothersday https://t.co/qBUtAYIt9N

data.text:

data.text:

📰👉 https://t.co/7BMRtGI8Cq

Sound good? Experience a taste of #Settimocielo for yourself! ✨

#AdAstra #Settimocielo #oncloudnine

data.text:
👏 Our sincere thanks to Captain Bisogni for his dedication and service over the years. 
We'd like to wish him all the best for his well-earned retirement! 🌴⛱️

#WeAreAirDolomiti #AdAstra https://t.co/F68n7MyO4s
@psaviousa Welcome back Ermete, always a pleasure for us to have you on board 💙 and what a fantastic view that day!

data.text:
🐣 Happy Easter! 
We hope your Easter egg is as special as ours! 😉✈️

**Please note that our customer service team is not available today and tomorrow. If you need assistance, please contact the Lufthansa Service Center: https://t.co/WiRoQzBAG3 https://t.co/UClfV2u0TH

POV: When your shift begins on the first flight of our new Embraer195 and a surprise like this is waiting for you 🍰😍

Many thanks to the Frankfurt catering team for this sweet welcome!
💙 @gicinternationalcatering https://t.co/FaMz8FRQS0
@LeeFennema ..spread wings! 😜✈️
